Tariff.A2: Unlimited All Local + STD calls, unlimited data usage upto 200Mbps speed. Shaw Academy + Wynk Music + Amazon prime subscription for 12 months + Disney+ Hotstar subscription for 12 months + Airtel Xstream Premium subscription.
Tariff.A268: Fair Usage Policy apply. Data quota 3333 GB_Speed upto 200Mbps. In case customer exhausts his GB quota during the bill cycle period, the plan speed will get throttled to 1mbps speed and customer will continue to enjoy the services till the end of bill cycle.
Tariff.A269: 1.This Plan is available as per bundled offering under Airtel BLACK Fixed Plan (also available as standalone open market plans). 2. one options is available with this fixedline broadband plan offering to customers. (i) (Broadband + DTH) - If Customer opts in for Broadband plan of monthly rental Rs. 999 he gets a discount of Rs. 250 on this broadband plan and and DTH pack of minimum Rs. 350/month, (all plan rental are excluded of taxes). 3. The charges are exclusive of applicable taxes. 4. Subscription to Airtel Xstream app . To be subscribed via Airtel Thanks app 5. Subscription to Amazon Prime for 12 months subject to subscriber continuing on the relevant plans. To be subscribed via Airtel Thanks app 6. Unlimited plans are for non-commercial usage 1) All rentals are exclusive of taxes. GST of 18% applicable on the rental and activation fee. 2) Installation fee of Rs 1000 applicable on all monthly plans. On subscription to 3m/ 6m/12m, activation charges will be waived off. On 6m and 12m plans, subscriber will get an additional discount of 7.5% and 15% respectively. 3)All Retail plans are for non-commercial usage. 4) The voice benefits under the Plan voucher cannot be used for outgoing calls to premium numbers, IN numbers, international numbers and other chargeable short codes; the subscriber will be charged applicable tariffs for the same. 5) All Thanks Benefits (including OTT subscriptions) can only be claimed through Airtel Thanks App 6) Unutilized free benefits will be forfeited at the expiry of recharge validity period of the plan. 7) All Advance/Prepaid billing cities will have "Only DSL Services" till POI from BSNL is obtained for the particular City. 8) Prepaid billing option is available for selected cities; Customer needs to pay the amount in advance in order to keep his services active. The advance billing bill cycle will start on the day of activation of the customer. Post expiry of the validity, customer need to recharge for the services to remain active. In case the customer fails to recharge post validity expiry, services will be discontinued. In case customer exhausts his/her data quota during the bill cycle period, the plan speed will get throttled to1mbps speed and customer will continue to enjoy the services till the end of the bill cycle. 9) The CPE and Digital Services may be provided either by Airtel and/or its affiliates / subsidiaries. This Plan shall only be available as a bundled offering along with CPE and Digital services. The customer shall accordingly make a payment of INR 200 towards CPE and Digital Services, separately to Airtel and/or its affiliates / subsidiaries, as the case may be. 10) For 6/12 months, customer is eligible for discount as per below: 6M Plan - Rental for 6 months would be Rs.4434. Payments towards CPE and Digital services will be Rs. 1200. 12M Plan - Rental for 12 months would be Rs.8150. Payments towards CPE and Digital services will be Rs. 2400.
